title: How to Make Cream Cheese Frosting

steps.headline: Get a mixer and combine the cream cheese and butter together.
steps.description: Beat at a medium speed to get a creamy texture.

steps.headline: Lower the speed and add the powdered sugar gradually.
steps.description: Mix the sugar into the butter/cream cheese mixture as you go.

steps.headline: Raise the speed again to a high one and mix everything thoroughly.
Add the vanilla and stir it in.

text: Get a mixer and combine the cream cheese and butter together. Beat at a medium speed to get a creamy texture. Lower the speed and add the powdered sugar gradually. Mix the sugar into the butter/cream cheese mixture as you go. Raise the speed again to a high one and mix everything thoroughly.  Add the vanilla and stir it in.
sentences: Get a mixer and combine the cream cheese and butter together.
Beat at a medium speed to get a creamy texture.
Lower the speed and add the powdered sugar gradually.
Mix the sugar into the butter/cream cheese mixture as you go.
Raise the speed again to a high one and mix everything thoroughly.
Add the vanilla and stir it in.
